listitem.para: Security-Relevant. Reason: The services (provided / required) implemented by the ComServer_CL and the rules for service-to-signal signal-to-service transformation needs to be static according with [ComServSpec] and [SST]. This means that it should NOT be possible to be changed during run-time.

Security-Relevant. Reason: The services (provided / required) implemented by the ComServer_CL and the rules for service-to-signal signal-to-service transformation needs to be static according with [ComServSpec] and [SST]. This means that it should NOT be possible to be changed during run-time.
